issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When creating a Windows platform project the ti.windows.publishername property is not present in the tiapp.xml, this causes the build to fail as described in TIMOB-19025. This property should be auto-populated upon project creation

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Create a new project
2. Open the tiapp.xml

h5.Actual Result

The ti.windows.publishername property is not defined

h5.Expected Result

The ti.windows.publishername should be defined on project creation
fields.summary: Windows: ti.windows.publishername property should be populated on project creation
